summary: Enables you to wear as many amulets and rings as you like. Requires Dawnguard, Dragonborn and SkyRe.
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=5]General Description[/size][/color][/font][/b]
Inspired by mods that allow players to wear unlimited jewelry (especially this mod which only modifies the vanilla Skyrim without the two DLCs: [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6703/?]Skyrim Unlimited Rings And Amulets[/url][/b]), I created this mod with Creation Kit to make sure that happens too, with SkyRe installed.

-See another mod I made if you only have Dawnguard & Dragonborn installed (doesn't matter whether you have Hearthfire): [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58500/?][b]Unlimited Jewelry for Dawnguard and Dragonborn[/b][/url]

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][color=#ff7700]Requirements[/color]
[/size][/font]T3nd0s Skyrim Redone[/b] 1.3.01: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286[/url]
Note that SkyRe requires Dawnguard and Dragonborn, so this mod too.
This means you have to load this "Unlimited Jewelry for SkyRe.esp" after SkyRe_Main.esp.

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][color=#ff7700]Installation & Uninstallation[/color]
[/size][/font][/b]Just install & uninstall with NMM should do the trick.

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][color=#ff7700]Compatibility[/color]
[/size][/font][/b]Should be compatible with any other mod that is compatible with SkyRe. Note that new jewelry added by mods other than SkyRe will likely not be able to be worn unlimitedly.

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][color=#ff7700]Troubleshooting[/color]
[/size][/font][/b]No bugs detected so far. Notify me if you find any.
author: Zoraag
